Anderson work see related , tell u something , fatigue symptom . This study divide two , 14-day period . During one 14-day period , give study drug . During period , give placebo . A placebo sugar tablet look like study drug tablet . You randomly pick ( toss coin ) one two treatment group . In one group receive study drug first placebo second . In group receive placebo first study drug second . The chance either treatment group equal . Neither research staff know treatment order assign . Before treatment start , fill questionnaire level fatigue , distress , symptom , general health . It take 5 minute complete questionnaire . You medical history , physical exam ( pulse , temperature , blood pressure ) , blood work do . At start study test heart call EKG do . At start study , finish study , complete additional questionnaire measure mood , fatigue , sleep , appetite . It take 15 minute complete questionnaire . You also complete series test memory , visual-motor , think function . These test take 30 minute complete . ( This evaluation may take place Day 1 study . ) On Day 1 , set study medication diary give . For first fourteen day study , take assign study medication ( either drug placebo ) . Everyday fill diary , noting time take study medication answer two question fatigue . On Day 7 , study personnel see clinic Ambulatory Treatment Center . The delegated research personnel take blood pressure pulse ask symptom complaint may medication may take . On Day 14 , study personnel see clinic Ambulatory Treatment Center blood pressure pulse measure . Unused study medication return diary reviewed delegate research personnel . You complete questionnaire ask fatigue , sleep , depression , symptom . It take 15 minute complete . You also complete series test memory , visual-motor , think function . The test take 30 minute complete . A blood draw do look change hemoglobin cytokine analysis . A new set study medication diary give . You follow instruction first time period . You take assign study medication every morning fill diary , noting time take study medication answer two question fatigue . On Day 21 , activity Day 7 occur . If schedule come M. D. If choose take blood pressure measurements home , need bring monitor study enrollment measurement double-checked research staff . On Day 28 , study end . The activity Day 14 occur . In addition , physical exam . You ask prefer first ( first 2 week study ) second ( second 2 week study ) treatment phase . If want continue take OROS Methylphenidate allow off-study long medical reason . This investigational study . The study drug approve attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder investigational treatment cancer relate fatigue . The study medication physical exam cost nothing . You reimburse fixed amount money schedule study visit . The payment form gift card parking expense gift card gas expense . The study doctor study staff tell able receive reimbursement . DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient diagnose breast , gastrointestinal , lymphoma , myeloma lung cancer undergo chemotherapy hormonal treatment 2 . Patient > = 18 year age 3 . Patient Brief Fatigue Inventory `` fatigue bad '' score > = 4 baseline 4 . Patient Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status < = 2 baseline 5 . Patient life expectancy > = 6 month start study 6 . Patient use acceptable birth control method . Female participant ( child bear potential sexually active ) male participant ( sexually active partner childbearing potential ) must use medically acceptable method birth control . Medically acceptable method contraception include abstinence , birth control pill , diaphragm spermicide , condom foam spermicide , vaginal spermicidal suppository surgical sterilization 7 . Patient must speak understand English 8 . Patient provide write informed consent participate study prior enrollment study 1 . History hypersensitivity reaction methylphenidate 2 . History current seizure disorder , glaucoma , major psychiatric diagnosis , narcolepsy , Tourette 's syndrome , tension agitation 3 . History clinically significant cardiac disease . 4 . Uncontrolled hypertension : stable treatment dose past month , systolic pressure consistently ( defined 3 consecutive blood pressure reading within last 30 day ) great 150 mm Hg diastolic pressure consistently great 85 mm Hg 5 . History fibromyalgia 6 . Use alcohol participate study 7 . Current use illicit drug history alcohol drug abuse and/or abuse potential ( see protocol criterion ) 8 . Moderate severe depression ( > = 20 Beck Depression Index II ) 9 . If take antidepressant , change dose and/or start new course treatment last 30 day 10 . Currently take psychostimulants ( include appetite suppressant ) , monoamine oxidase ( MAO ) inhibitor , anticoagulant anticonvulsant therapy 11 . Current use corticosteroid , medication , stimulant ( i.e. , vivarin ) use improve fatigue symptom 12 . Use investigational medication within past month 13 . Current use follow herbal supplement fatigue relief ( DHEA , SAME , ginkgo , ginseng , St. John 's Wort ( include DHEA , SAME , ginkgo , ginseng , St. John 's Wort , metabolite , effedrin , basil , citronella , fennel , horseradish root , lavender flower , lemon verbena , marjoram , mint , nettle , pine needle , rosemary , sage , savory , thyme , bay , cayenne pepper , cinnamon , eucalyptus , hyssop , myrrh , oregano , peppermint , ginseng , green , black Chinese tea , ephedra ( aka mahuang ) , popotillo , Mormon tea ) 14 . Any coexist medical condition take concomitant medication likely interfere safe administration methylphenidate 15 . Patients start epoetin within 30 day prior enrollment 16 . Patients start take epoetin first week study 17 . Hemoglobin < 8.0 gm/dl 18 . Patients thyroidstimulating hormone ( TSH ) value > = 1.5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) 19 . Albumin value 50 % low low limit normal 20 . Evidence hepatic impairment [ total bilirubin > = 2.5 time ULN ( normal range 0 1.0 mg/dl , serum glutamate pyruvate transaminase ( SGPT ) > = 2.5 time ULN ) ] 21 . Evidence renal impairment ( serum creatinine > 2.5 time ULN , normal range 0.8 1.5 mg/dl ) 22 . A severe narrowing ( pathological iatrogenic ) , obstruction gastrointestinal tract , gastrointestinal malabsorption 23 . If take anxiolytic , and/or hypnotic , change dose and/or start new course treatment last 30 day 24 . Patients nausea , vomit , diarrhea Common Toxicity Criteria Adverse Effects ( CTCAE ) grade III high 25 . If take anticonvulsant sensory neuropathy ( Gabapentin Pregabalin ) , change dose and/or start new course treatment last 30 day 26 . History severe headache within 30 day prior enrollment
